summary: REQ-1 appears to be implemented in PreMeditationPage via a flexbox layout intended to pin the “More details” button to the bottom of the guide container. However, the diff summary also indicates additional UI/behavior changes that were explicitly listed as non-goals or outside the requested scope.

hallucinated_features.description: Changed the “Begin meditation” button ('cigrx0') padding to py-3.
hallucinated_features.reason: Explicit non-goal: “Do not change the “Begin meditation” button 'cigrx0' padding in this build.” The diff summary text indicates this padding was changed.
evidence: frontend-file-summaries.txt (entry for frontend/src/pages/PreMeditationPage.tsx: "\"Begin meditation\" button with py-3 padding")

hallucinated_features.description: Adjusted DurationRangeInput integration/props ("corrected prop names" / "no id prop").
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by REQ-1 and risks impacting the 'bpmktq' duration range input behavior, which is explicitly a non-goal to change in this build.
evidence: frontend-file-summaries.txt (entry for frontend/src/pages/PreMeditationPage.tsx: "corrected prop names for DurationRangeInput (no id prop)")

hallucinated_features.description: Adjusted AmbientMusicCarousel integration/props (selectedMusic instead of selectedMusicId).
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by REQ-1; this is a change to unrelated functionality beyond the specified scope constraint.
evidence: frontend-file-summaries.txt (entry for frontend/src/pages/PreMeditationPage.tsx: "AmbientMusicCarousel (selectedMusic instead of selectedMusicId)")

hallucinated_features.description: Added multiple new_feature_requests and known issues entries unrelated to REQ-1 into project_state.json (AR-2 through AR-5).
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest only asks for REQ-1; adding additional tracked requests for non-goal items is not requested as part of the build output.
